page.title: 20Sailing on Pitsford Water
page.content:
Northampton Sailing Club have their clubhouse and moorings at the Brixworth end of the reservoir dam with access from the A5O8 just north of Pitsford village. The clubhouse has a bar and hot drinks available. Established in 1958, the club now has over 3OO craft.Almost 5OO acres of water is available for sailing.Local schools train from adjacent premises and rescue services are provided from April to October. Short period one month membership costs Â£15.

{The information on these pages was {collected and compiled by pupils, {staff and friends of Boothville Middle {School, Northampton during June and {July, 1985.
